resources.string: Which of these works takes place during the Hmelnitsky uprising in Ukraine?
Mikhail Lermontov, “A Hero of Our Time”
Johannes Vastovius , “The Vine of the North”
1. Taras Bulba and With Fire and Sword are about the Hmelnitsky uprising.
What is the purpose of a Cossack’s forelock hairstyle?
It brushes the devil off his shoulder
It gives St. Peter something to hold on to so he can pull the Cossack out of the pits of hell into heaven
It honours a legendary warrior saint
It makes it easier to tell apart Tatars, Cossacks, and Polish at a greater distance
2. A Cossack’s forelock brushes the devil off his shoulder, and helps St. Peter pull him out of hell.
Which pair of countries below has fought the most wars with each other?
3. Denmark and Sweden has fought the most wars with each other. By some reckonings, this pair has fought more wars than any other pair of countries in the world.
Alexander Nevsky became a hero of Russia by battling:

4. Alexander Nevsky became a hero due to the Battle of the Ice against the Teutonic Knights. There is little real evidence of Nevsky battling Swedes, and he dealt with the Golden Horde through diplomacy.
Peter the Great tried to modernise Russia by, among other things, taxing the nobility’s:
5. Peter the Great taxed the beards of the nobles. The intended effect was to make the noble boyars adopt modern fashions, and by extension, modern attitudes.
Cossack traditional clothing inspired the national dress of which of these countries?
7. Cossacks influenced national dress in Ukraine, Georgia, and Azerbaijan - in the latter cases, through the Don Cossack coats known as cherkassky.

The Swedish king Gustav Adolf commissioned the great battleship “Wasa” for his war against Poland-Lithuania, which sank on its maiden voyage inside the Stockholm Archipelago. The ship has since been recovered and is housed in a museum in Stockholm. In what year did the Wasa sink?
Which Cossack leader is immortalised in the song “Volga, my motherland”?
9. “Volga, my motherland” is about Stepan Razin - the alternate title of the song is “Stenka Razin”.
The region Courland was previously a Duchy, controlled at various times by Livonia, Sweden, Poland-Lithuania, Russia, and others. In which country is Courland located today?
These questions are hard, so well done!
